Hello Maths!
Play cool calculation games alone and with a partner.
Your Maths!
We tell your strengths and help you identify your shortcomings.
Improve Smartly!
We help you to work on your weakness and improve overall.
World Percentile!
We give your rank in terms of percentile among all our users across the globe.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Play Again
Make me your habit!
Did you try all the games?Levels?
Step by Step, keep killing!
Make your brain like IRON!
23 * 59? Practice till you get it in 1 sec!
Be self made Usain Bolt in Calculation!
Want fun? Ask a stranger to play TwoSome!
Mentally strong people are rare species, be one!
More you do, More faster you will do ;)!
TwoSome is awesome ;)!
Sir, Could you teach me some calculations?
Seems like, someone is tough to beat!
You Rock. Period!
Wow Wow Wow!
How do you do that?
I would never be able to beat you in TwoSome!
East or West, U r the Player Best!
Day or Night, U know how to fight!
Guide or Rule, U neva loose the cool!
Great going Usain Bolt!
No time & you will be on moon!
Flow like water, Burn like fire!
You are a Brain Machine!
Why don\'t you teach me some maths?
Come on, how can you be this fast?
Great Going!
You are Genius. Period!
You seems to be solving everything. How?
My calculator isn\'t working, Can I borrow your Brain!
I want a Calulator App, just a cloned version of your Brain!
You can replace this App by your brain!
Can I marry your Brian!
I am attracted towards the genius!
Everybody is a genius, maybe not as you!
Stay in 99 percentile!
Ships are not made in 1 day!
Fight back! Get Full/Full!
Sometimes shit happens! :D
You can\'t play like this.
I think this app is not working fine.
Day or Night, keep on the Fight!
East or West, practice before you Rest!
Nobody becomes an expert in one day!
Fun is to fight back!
Get some winning shots ;)!
You acted or am I dreaming?
I don\'t get this much also!
Keep playing for a week, non-stop!
Cheese or Butter?
I hate low scores, please get me a good one!
I, kind of, not worried about you. coz U will do!
I trust you!
Stay calm, I can present same test 100 times!
Fun isn\'t over! get the same score again ;)
Ramanujan wouldn\'t have scored this!
At your father\'s time, I wasn\'t even born!
Can\'t we play again?
Run like Milkha Singh! You will win!
Sachin doesn\'t score a Ton in every match!
Chill, It\'s just a stupid game!
